I endorse Eli Moore wholeheartedly and would recommend him without reservation to anyone who needs a traffic or criminal attorney. Mr. Moore handled my motorcycle ticket in such a professional and competent manner that I referred him to other attorneys in my office as well as my own brother, who is also an attorney. Mr. Moore expertly cross-examined the police officer who had given me the ticket. He had a thorough knowledge of the law and what it would take to discredit the officer's testimony. In fact, he did such a good job that near the end of his cross, the Judge interrupted him and dismissed the ticket, commenting that she didn't understand why the cop issued the ticket in the first place. As a colleague in criminal and supreme court, I have seen Mr. Moore handle dozens of criminal cases. He is always prepared, diligent and conscientious while vigorously defending his clients. I wish he would let me put him on retainer to handle all my traffic and speeding tickets!See more
